backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two Valentine experience updates and affected components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing each frontend component’s role in the Valentine experience.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app orchestrating scene flow, preload handling, and scroll transitions between sections.
frontend/src/components/valentine/assets: Exports paths for all Valentine-themed image and audio assets.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Contin: Floating continue button prompting users to advance to the next scene.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Letter: Exports the static valentine letter text with preserved formatting.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Loadin: Full‑screen loading overlay showing a progress bar and animated heart during asset preload.
frontend/src/components/valentine/MovieT: Interactive bouncing ticket scene with catch‑to‑reveal behavior and continue prompt.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Opening mailbox interaction revealing an envelope and unfolding letter with ambient audio and continue prompt.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Scratc: React component rendering a scratch-off framed illustration that unlocks once the user scratches past 60%.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientAudio.ts: Hook for managing looping background audio playback using the Valentine audio asset.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetPreloader.ts: Preloads images and audio assets while tracking loading progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useScratchOffCanvas.t: Hook implementing a scratch-off canvas overlay with percentage tracking and pointer-based erasing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and custom Valentine-themed color, font, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, playful fonts, extended shadows, and multiple animation/keyframe definitions for floating and reveal effects.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, listing required aesthetic changes, critical usability issues, and the need to replace the couple illustration while maintaining a playful Valentine’s experience.
